scripts.build:react:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/esm --format esm --external react --external react-dom
scripts.build:react:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/cjs --format cjs --external react --external react-dom
scripts.build:react: bun run build:react:esm && bun run build:react:cjs && mv dist/cjs/index.js dist/cjs/index.cjs && mv dist/esm/index.js dist/esm/index.mjs
scripts.build:vanilla: bun run build:vanilla:esm && bun run build:vanilla:cjs && mv dist/cjs/vanilla.js dist/cjs/vanilla.cjs && mv dist/esm/vanilla.js dist/esm/vanilla.mjs
scripts.build: bun run build:react && bun run build:vanilla && bun run build:types
scripts.health-check: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test && bun run build
scripts.lint: bun run eslint src tests --ext cjs,mjs,ts,tsx
scripts.test:integration: bun run build && for f in tests/integration/*; do bun run $f; done
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run test && bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run build
scripts.example:react: cd example/react && bun install && bun run dev
